name: SupportSnakeGirlAndDoggo
_source: speak;SnakeGirl;Oh!|A...a big doggy?|Are you friendly, doggy?
speak;SnakeGirl;He he he!|You are friendly!|I'm {v:SnakeGirlName}.|I've never seen a dog like you before.
speak;SnakeGirl;Your fur looks so warm and fluffy!|But...you smell like fire?|Are you okay?
speak;SnakeGirl;You're not hurt?|Good!|I was worried you might be sick.
speak;SnakeGirl;<red>Little doggy, big and strong...</>|<red>I hope we can be friends...<red>
speak;SnakeGirl;You like my singing?|Most people run away when they see me.|But you're not scared at all!
speak;SnakeGirl;Want to stay with me for a while?|It gets lonely sometimes...
speak;SnakeGirl;Really? You'll stay?|<red>Thank you, doggy friend...</>
speak;SnakeGirl;Your fur really is soft...|Just like I imagined!
speak;SnakeGirl;He he!|We're going to be good friends, aren't we?
speak;SnakeGirl;Were you looking for me?|That's so sweet!|I was practicing my singing.
speak;SnakeGirl;Look what I found!|I found a flower!|It's so pretty!|Do you like flowers, {v:DoggoName}?
speak;SnakeGirl;I just learned about flowers!|I don't know how I remember them though...
speak;SnakeGirl;I don't remember much about being little.|Just...singing, and warmth, and then...nothing.
speak;SnakeGirl;But that's okay!|Because now I have friends!|Like you!
speak;SnakeGirl;<red>Doggy friend with eyes so bright...</>|<red>Stay with me throughout the night...</>
speak;SnakeGirl;You really do like my singing!|Nobody ever listened before...|They always looked away or ran.
speak;SnakeGirl;But you look right at me!|You're not afraid of my eyes at all!
speak;SnakeGirl;He he!|Maybe it's because you're special too?|We're both different from everyone else.
speak;SnakeGirl;<red>Two strange friends, side by side...</>|<red>No more need to run and hide...</>
speak;SnakeGirl;<red>Gentle waves upon the shore...</>|<red>Peaceful now, and nothing more...</>
speak;SnakeGirl;{v:DoggoName}!|You always find me when I'm singing.|Do you follow the sound of my voice?
speak;SnakeGirl;Come sit with me.|The water is so pretty here.|It reminds me of...something.|A dream, maybe?
speak;SnakeGirl;{v:DoggoName}...do you think I'm scary?|I mean...really scary?
speak;SnakeGirl;He he he!|That sounded like a 'no' bark.|You're so kind to me, {v:DoggoName}.
speak;SnakeGirl;I've been having strange dreams lately.|About swimming...and hunting...and being angry.
speak;SnakeGirl;But then I wake up, and I just want to sing.|And play with my friends.|I don't want to hurt anyone.
speak;SnakeGirl;You understand, don't you?|Being different...but still wanting to be good?
speak;SnakeGirl;You're my very first real friend, {v:DoggoName}.|Before you, I was so alone.
speak;SnakeGirl;<red>Never alone, never again...</>|<red>Found my family, found my friend...</>
speak;SnakeGirl;After this war...|Will you help me find other lonely people?|Maybe I can sing for them too!
speak;SnakeGirl;We'll travel together!|A singing gorgon and her faithful hound!|<red>Adventures waiting, just we two...</>
speak;SnakeGirl;Here!|Let's play fetch while I practice my new song!
